models.skill: A capability available to agents, such as weather lookup or Slack integration. Has a global enable/disable state and per-agent assignment.
models.agent: A minimal agent reference used for skill assignment â€” just enough to show identity and toggle state.

relationships: A skill can be assigned to many agents
An agent can have many skills enabled

skills.name: Weather Lookup
skills.description: Fetch current weather conditions and forecasts for any city worldwide using the OpenWeatherMap API.

skills.name: Slack Messaging
skills.description: Send messages, reply to threads, and post rich blocks to any Slack channel or DM the agent is bound to.

skills.name: Web Search
skills.description: Perform web searches via the Brave Search API and return summarized results with source links.

skills.name: GitHub Issues
skills.description: Create, read, update, and comment on GitHub issues across configured repositories.

skills.name: Calendar Events
skills.description: Read and create Google Calendar events, check availability, and send meeting invites on behalf of the user.

skills.name: Image Generation
skills.description: Generate images from text prompts using DALL-E 3, returning URLs or base64-encoded output.

skills.name: SQL Query
skills.description: Execute read-only SQL queries against configured PostgreSQL or SQLite databases and return formatted results.

skills.name: Email Send
skills.description: Compose and send emails via SendGrid with support for HTML templates, attachments, and CC/BCC recipients.
